    Base58

    Base58 and Base58Check encoding

    address = [0x00, 0x01, 0x09, 0x66, 0x77, 0x60, 0x06, 0x95, 0x3D, 0x55, 0x67, 0x43,
           0x9E, 0x5E, 0x39, 0xF8, 0x6A, 0x0D, 0x27, 0x3B, 0xEE]
base58checkencode(address)

text = b"hello world"
base58encode(text)
